name: CTRubyPosition
desc: Constants that specify the position of the ruby text relative to to the base text.

items.name: case before
items.desc: The ruby text is positioned before the base text, appearing above horizontal text and to the right of vertical text.

items.name: case after
items.desc: The ruby text is positioned after the base text, appearing below horizontal text and to the left of vertical text.

items.name: case interCharacter
items.desc: The ruby text is positioned to the right of the base text, regardless of whether it's horizontal or vertical.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: The ruby text follows the base text with no special styling.

items.name: case count
items.desc: A constant that accounts for all ruby positions during ruby annotation creation.
